oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Armistead, C. B., 1912 November 13
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original document pertaining to the probate of the will of C. B. Armistead. Illustrates the first page of the document. Armistead’s will was admitted to the Davidson County Court for probate on November 13th, 1912 “in error.” The petitioners were Lorena S. Armistead and Charles T. Sullivan. C. B. Armistead’s will “should have been probably in the County court of Williamson County, Tenn., the residence of the said C. B. Armistead at the time of his death. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Armistead family
